sentences.en: "Here's your ticket," he said, and he tore it off the pad.
sentences.cn: “给你票，”他说着，从票本上把票撕了下来。

sentences.en: Another scalper said he'd charge $1000 for a $125 ticket.
sentences.cn: 另一个票贩子说125美元的票他要价1,000美元。

sentences.en: He bought a return ticket and boarded the next train for home.
sentences.cn: 他买了往返票，并登上了下一趟回家的火车。

sentences.en: He had a ticket for a flight on Friday.
sentences.cn: 他有一张星期五的机票。

sentences.en: He ran for governor on the Republican ticket.
sentences.cn: 他作为共和党的候选人竞选州长。

sentences.en: He showed his ticket to the conductor and got on.
sentences.cn: 他向检票员出示了车票，然后上了车。

sentences.en: His chosen field was unlikely to be a meal ticket for life.
sentences.cn: 他选的这一行是不可能赖以为生的。

sentences.en: How much does it say on the price ticket ?
sentences.cn: 价签上标明的价格是多少？

sentences.en: I've just got a parking ticket— my first in years.
sentences.cn: 我刚刚收到了一张违法停车罚款通知单——多年来头一遭。

sentences.en: if that man talks to the police, it's tickets for him.
sentences.cn: 如果那人向警察告发的话，那他就没命了。

sentences.en: parking/speeding ticket
sentences.cn: 违法停车/超速行驶罚款单

sentences.en: She bought a lottery ticket and won more than $33 million.
sentences.cn: 她买了张彩票，中了3,300多万美元。

sentences.en: Should you lose your ticket call collect on STA's helpline.
sentences.cn: 若遗失机票，请拨打STA的免费求助热线。

sentences.en: Slow down or you'll get a ticket.
sentences.cn: 开慢点儿，否则你会接到一张罚款通知单。

sentences.en: Ten days later Carmen received a bank draft for a plane ticket.
sentences.cn: 10天后卡门收到了一张用于购买机票的银行汇票。

sentences.en: The price of a single ticket is thirty-nine pounds.
sentences.cn: 单程票的价格是39英镑。

sentences.en: There was some bloke on the phone waffling about an airline ticket.
sentences.cn: 电话里有个家伙在唠叨一张飞机票的事情。

sentences.en: This season the club has had 73,500 season-ticket holders.
sentences.cn: 本赛季该俱乐部已经有73,500名持有季票的观众。

sentences.en: You can have my ticket.
sentences.cn: 我可以把我的票给你。

sentences.en: You simply can't get a ticket through official channels.
sentences.cn: 通过官方渠道是压根儿搞不到票的.

sentences.en: You'd better run if you're going to get your ticket.
sentences.cn: 想买到票的话，你最好跑几步。

words.tran_cn: 加标签于；指派；对…开出交通违规罚单

phrases.tran_cn: 免票，免费票；四坏球自由上垒
(澳／新西兰，非正式)自高自大，自负
(美，非正式)有意承担能让自己升职的任务
售票代理处；代理售票人
售票台；售票柜台；票务处
(非正式，主北美)自定计划；自己规划前程

trans.tran_cn: 票，入场券，标签，传票，交通违规的通知单，<美>候选人名单
trans.tran_en: a printed piece of paper which shows that you have paid to enter a cinema, travel on a bus, plane etc

trans.tran_cn: 加标签于；指派；对…开出交通违规罚单
trans.tran_en: to give someone a ticket for parking their car in the wrong place, driving too fast etc

trans.tran_cn: 售票，给…门票，加标签于，指派，对。。开交通违章通知单
